channel.title: Introductions — George Pór
channel.description:
**Where on the globe are you?**
In Brighton, a beautiful seaside town 1-hr from London. Originally from Budapest, and spent 20 yrs in California. I came here because regarding the culture and nature in Europe, (next to Barcelona) Brighton comes the closest to Santa Cruz, my fave ol' stomping ground.
**What is your main gig?**
presently, it's [SymmaSys](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1k9t25tYRMrBiN5UdBJ8C7ER7AXUXboogBWVyVExU3ZA/edit), a project of [Future HOW](https://futurehow.site/), which will use my Generative Action Research methodology that I wrote about [here](https://www.academia.edu/33749187/On_the_Verge_of_Collective_Awakening) and will be conducted, hopefully, in collaboration with the Hashverse of CICOlab.
**LinkedIn link?** https://www.linkedin.com/in/georgepor/
**What is your connection to OGM?**
in one word: **Jerry**
in a few more words, from my **"global mind" researcher** side: the "Designing for the Emergence of a Global-scale Collective Intelligence" paper that I [presented](http://pespmc1.vub.ac.be/GB-issue/GB-oldstuff/Por3.html) at a conference in 2001
in a few more words, from my **"social acupuncturist"** side: the possibility to use my gifts for helping to unblock whatever prevents the energy flow more freely in the social body of OGM
in a few more words, from my **"future chronicler"** side: what I wrote about in [my OGM2025 story](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1hDe5NGcPsbTSxnvUCcRhNXlxFxs7OhSja3ztL6tPeMU/edit)
**What part interests you most?**
definitely, the [enfolded/implicate part](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Implicate_and_explicate_order), in David Bohm's sense
**What are your superpowers?**
being an evolutionary sherpa (see below) ![Screenshot 2020-10-30 at 06.48.59|690x491](upload://5M7sOXW2u6tNFW9BtU6sxk4IvNL.jpeg)
